snippet: It is easy to feel how tangible a generation really is after it is gone.
abstract: Verlyn Klinkenborg Editorial Notebook muses on a photograph of his father and his father's siblings taken on their farm in the 1930s; holds that it becomes easy to understand the nature of a generation only after it has passed.
lead_paragraph: It is easy to feel how tangible a generation really is after it is gone.

headline.seo: We Who Are Left When a Generation Passes
headline.main: We Who Are Left When a Generation Passes
headline.print_headline: We Who Are Left When a Generation Passes
